Description: Central processing unit for infotainment system managing media, navigation and connectivity
GPS navigation software with map data and route calculation capabilities
Audio/video playback system supporting multiple media formats
Wireless communication module for phone connectivity and audio streaming
Touchscreen display unit for user interface and visual feedback
Power amplifier for speaker system with digital signal processing
Voice input system for hands-free calling and voice commands
Internet connectivity module providing vehicle WiFi access point
Integration software for Android device connectivity and mirroring
Integration software for iOS device connectivity and mirroring
